net.sf.jclal.dataset

Class WekaDataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.dataset.AbstractDataset
      • net.sf.jclal.dataset.WekaDataset
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, IDataset, JCLAL

    public class WekaDataset
extends AbstractDataset
    Class that represents a Weka dataset
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
